snippet.title: XBlaze Code: Embryo Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
XBlaze Code: Embryo has been rated "M" for Mature by the Entertainment Software Ratings Board (ESRB). For more information, visit www.esrb.org.
_______________________________

visit http://www.aksysgames.com/xblaze/
for more information.
_______________________________

XBlaze Code: Embryo for the PlayStation®3 entertainment system and PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system is a visual novel and prequel to the hit BlazBlue fighting game series.

Story

Set 150 years prior to the events in BlazBlue, XBlaze Code: Embryo follows Touya Kagari, a high school student who finds himself embroiled in events beyond his understanding when he's attacked out of the blue. A girl called Es appears and protects him, but then refuses to leave, claiming her mission is to ensure his safety. Suddenly thrown into a world of magic and the supernatural, Touya will struggle to uncover a hidden truth.
